items.badge_description: Fresh air and great beer — a perfect combo. Celebrate your adventure with the exclusive Love Hiking badge, brought to you by Athletic Brewing Co. and Oboz Footwear. Both proud B Corps, these brands are committed to protecting the outdoors and inspiring every step of your journey. Earning this badge also qualifies you for one (1) entry in the Beer Gear: Love Hiking Giveaway sponsored by Athletic Brewing Co. and Oboz Footwear. Terms and conditions apply, click here for more details.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 20 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 5!
